Module jBomberman
Package model

Class NpcMediator

java.lang.Object
model.NpcMediator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyGridFormat
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnjoyNpcMediator
public abstract class NpcMediator extends Object implements MyGridFormat
Mediator that encapsulates dependencies of NPC in every game level. It manages their correct functionality. Set its visitor before use.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface model.MyGridFormat

    COLUMNS, REGULAR_WALLS, ROWS
